title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series, it does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition.
3. Select a column without any data.
